scripts.dev:css-styled: cd apps/css-styled-base && bun run dev & cd apps/css-styled-red && bun run dev
scripts.dev:tailwind-headless: cd apps/tailwind-headless-base && bun run dev & cd apps/tailwind-headless-red && bun run dev
scripts.dev:tailwind-styled: cd apps/tailwind-styled-base && bun run dev & cd apps/tailwind-styled-red && bun run dev
scripts.dev:vanilla-extract-headless: cd apps/vanilla-extract-headless-base && bun run dev & cd apps/vanilla-extract-headless-red && bun run dev
scripts.dev:vanilla-extract-styled: cd apps/vanilla-extract-styled-base && bun run dev & cd apps/vanilla-extract-styled-red && bun run dev
